topics.body:
I feel like if I were a character on a The Time Wasting Thread TV show, my running gag would be that I have a new obsession every episode

Like I have some static interests, but if there was an episode made of us today, my thing would be
!http://i.ytimg.com/vi/owekgBASJ0Y/maxresdefault.jpg!
I'm just sitting in the background with "this":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HWWB_BBtrTs blaring max volume while you all go on with your lives

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559ef144636872718f000c83#post_559ef144636872718f000c83

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559ef15c636872718f000ca0#post_559ef15c636872718f000ca0
It was some stupid movie based on true events though they could be lying. (Cant remember th name)

Basically the movie was about these people that did something stupid on the internet. Told a girl to kill herself...and she did. pretty terrible.

And so because of that the rich father decided to get revenge on them by killing them, and, the people they knew who were innocent. 

And the movie didn't hold back on showing people get there brains shot out and arms being chopped off and maaany more things. 

The whole plot was that the rich dude gave them these fake tickets that they had won a free trip to somewhere (Forget where) and had all these people on a plane where they couldn't escape. And said "If you kill such and such right next to you such and such will live".

End of the movie you fined out everyone was already dead. 

Its a pretty fucked up movie.

But yeah

I suppose I just need to tell them it's my life, and my decisions what I do with it

And it caught it HARD if that's not obvious enough already

But the Pirate gear gameplay in Pirate's Curse seems hella fun to me
